tool_description: NsLookup queries the specified DNS server and retrieves records associated with the domain name you provided.

api_list.name: Reverse
api_list.description: Get name servers from an IP address.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: The IP address for which to retrieve name servers.

api_list.name: Nslookup
api_list.description: Queries the specified DNS server and retrieves various DNS records associated with the provided domain name, including A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, NS, and TXT records.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain name for which to retrieve DNS records.
